attributes.action: Ban Dave Collins from wearing his pocket watch as long as he is breathing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: showing a blatant disregard for his own public safety and the wishes of people known to him Mr Dave Collins of twatville, liverpool, likes to sport a gold pocket watch even though he knows it'll all end in tears. please sign my petition and force this social monster to bin the watch and allow people to go about their socialising without the threat of being pulped anally.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
